If the mantis don't getcha, the design will

Host Mantis

The Host Mantis team wanted a light website design with more of a modern touch then they had previously. We worked together to come up with something simple and to the point, no vibrant in your face stock photos/images. Just to the point, web hosting. I tweaked their color scheme a bit and they were happy with the overall look.
